description: Cook extra mashed potato in the week and you’ll have the basis of this fabulous brunch dish.
name: Potato Pancakes With Smoked Salmon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 25g plain flour, plus extra for dusting

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potato, egg, and flour in a mixing bowl. Season well and stir to combine. Divide into eight equal portions and, with flour- dusted hands, shape into rounds about 7cm in diameter.

Heat the oil in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Carefully add the pancakes to the pan. Cook for 10-15 minutes, occasionally turning the pancakes carefully with a fish slice, until they are browned and hot right through.
Transfer the pancakes to warmed plates. Top each with smoked salmon, soured cream, and dill. Season well with black pepper and serve with lemon wedges.
